attributes.action: Give parents an option to not to send their child school during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Let parents or guardians decide if they want to protect their children by keeping them home.
attributes.background: To stop further spread of COVID-19, parents or guardians should be allowed to not to send children school.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
